creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: A man in long pants and no shirt; he faces forward in a chair and holds flowers in his lap; the words "May 1987" inscribed, UC; predominant colors: blue, grey and yellow
marks: Signed, dated, numbered, chop mark LC: [S.P. NA 1990]
medium: Lithographs with hand-coloring on hand-made paper in linen portfolio box
title: Study for "May 1987", from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
